Airline Tycoon 2 Changelog for version 1.0.2 â€“ October 12, 2011
â€¢ The total cost of the cabin equipment is now listed at the bottom of the cabinpartlist
â€¢ If a competitor goes bankrupt, you will still be able to view his statistics
â€¢ You can no longer zoom out in event locations
â€¢ You can now buy objects from the shop by double clicking
â€¢ The target condition will now be calculated correctly
â€¢ You can now adjust the starting money more easily
â€¢ There are new tooltips in the mission selection
â€¢ Some voiceovers did not play correctly this has been fixed
â€¢ The distance visualisation of orders has been changed
â€¢ Fixed a random crash when opening the statistic screen
â€¢ The runspeed of the tycoons has been increased by 10%
â€¢ The piemenu is no longer on top of the airportguide
â€¢ If you activate autosave, it will now save at the end of every day
â€¢ You can now watch airplanes directly from the lounge (This was a special request from the community)
